author: jdonnerstag
msg: wicket-1224: PopupCloseLink broken with 1.3.0-rc2 in Internet Explorer
It was changed as part of wicket-1139 but IE doesn't like it. In order to avoid the problem I usually add to my apps
I wonder if especially setStripXmlDeclarationFromOutput(true) wouldn't be a better default due to IE problems. The http header still contains the encoding.
I leave this case open until we found a fix for both problem, but remove the xml declaration for the file to work properly
